committees.name: Management Committee
committees.description: Responsible for developing strategy, guiding club culture, overseeing good governance and leading the sub-committees.

committees.name: Rowing Committee
committees.description: Responsible for all rowing matters including training, racing, coaching and development and maintenance of the boat fleet.

committees.name: Operations Committee
committees.description: Responsible for non-rowing activities including clubhouse and grounds maintenance, social activities, Regatta organisation, sponsorship and grants, and IT.

committees.name: Compliance Committee
committees.description: Responsible for ensuring that the club is compliant with financial, safeguarding and safety responsibilities and duties.

committees.name: Development Committee
committees.description: When formed, will identify options for investing club funds in infrastructure or club development

presidentDescription: By convention, the incoming Mayor of Sudbury is invited each year to become the Club president.
vicePresidentDescription: Vice-presidents are elected each year at the AGM.
